summary: lower the drop chance of dragon hearts and inscribers
descriptionHtml:
This mod lower the dragon heart's drop chance from 67 to 35 and the inscriber's one from 90 to 45.

I made this patch because with the original stats those stuff pratically never appear, besides i saw a lot of people asking for it.. and particularly  for DD and DCO users it really shouldn't be a cheat ^^

make me know if it works correctly and if i have to lower or raise the chance (dragonebone and scale's ones are 25..so i take mine a little more hig but, mostly the inscriber, shouldn't appear too frequently)

Future update
esp with different drop chance (if needed)

models replacement: the original mod use orchis and ancient nord weapon models.. if i'll be able to do so (and now i'm not ^^), i'm thinking to change them with the new dragonbone weapons from dlc orand (if i'll have the permission) with some of the wonderful models in the nexus

Install

put this after the original esp

requirement

Dragonbone Weapon from Aeonvita
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1935/?

All the credits have to go to Aeonvita, the author of the original mod
author: Jodi79
